testCases.explanation: Remove [1,3] to have [1,2],[2,3],[3,4] which are non-overlapping
Remove two overlapping copies; keep only one [1,2]
Touching intervals [1,2] and [2,3] are considered non-overlapping; remove 0
[2,3] is inside [1,4]; remove [1,4] to keep [2,3]. 1 removal.
[1,3] and [2,4] overlap; remove [2,4] so [1,3] and [3,5] remain non-overlapping

description: Given an array of intervals, return the minimum number of intervals you need to remove to make the rest of the intervals non-overlapping.

examples.explanation: [1,3] can be removed and the rest of the intervals are non-overlapping.
